amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to promulgate or implement any regulations that would mandate global positioning system (GPS) tracking, electronic on-board recording devices, or event data recorders in passenger or commercial motor vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Landry amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Landry amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Landry.
